Portfolio

I've been making all sorts of websites for 7 years.
Here's an overview of some of my work:

Project 1:

Online diagnosis for a major healthcare provider - I vetted the designs, implemented the mockups, and integrated the designs into a Java framework.

Project 2:

I managed brand development, designed the website, and integrated the design into a Shopify theme. I also designed marketing materials like flyers, business cards, and online ads.

Project 3:

Implemented HTML/CSS/Javascript design from mockups.

Project 4:

Designed and built custom online registration system for the organization's annual music showcase.
